name: dingle
description: A digital scrapbook diary app with auto-save, backup history, and advanced export features

scripts.electron:dev: concurrently "vite" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && npm run electron:compile && electron ."
scripts.electron:build: vite build && npm run electron:compile && electron-builder
scripts.electron:build:mac: CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false vite build && npm run electron:compile && electron-builder --mac
scripts.electron:build:win: npm run generate:icon && npm run generate:icon:ico && vite build && npm run electron:compile && electron-builder --win
scripts.electron:build:linux: vite build && npm run electron:compile && electron-builder --linux
scripts.prebuild:signed: npm run clean:xattr && echo '⚠️  서명 빌드 전 xattr 정리 완료. iCloud/Dropbox 경로 확인 필요!'
